comment.author: 63187003@N06
comment._content: Great Picture it brings back memmeries in the early 70s TWA 707s practiced TandGs at stockton Field they would spend countless houers pilet training.they flew over my house. it wasent surprised 2 c 5 or 6 707s,DC-8s DC-9s B-720s and even B-747s DC-10s douing countless Tand Gs allday and even night i loved it i can remember practicing 4 a speed controlle line contest at my loco school and a TWA 707 was training and beleave it or not a TWA 747 came later that afternoon i guss my crew and i enjoyed cinc them and not really carring about  testing my speed plane it was a great afternoon O by the way i blew my engine in the 1st roung O well. thangs mikey from stockton ca.
